input.sentences: a happy gentleman waiting for the festivities to start .
the woman of the day is waiting .
the musical entertainment for the event is performing .
a happy couple is watching the event .
the main couple enters the room | while everyone watches with happiness .
output.sentences: Bobby was so happy that he had been asked to be his brother's best man and posed for a picture.
Even Mom was nervous as she stood at the kitchen window looking out into the back yard.
The whole family was involved in the big day with Uncles James and John providing the music.
Mary, the bride's college roommate came with her new husband.
Before you could blink the ceremony was over and the family enjoyed the reception under the marquis in the back yard.
